Worked fine for me: burned onto Verbatim DVD+R DL discs @ 2.4x speed, using Imgburner.  didn't bother with abgx or w.e, simply as I don't use the xbox on live. Beat it, no issues with the actual game content whatsoever.

Onto the Game: Holy crap. I haven't been this enthralled in a game for some time. The story line is amazing, the graphics are meh (although, as odd as it sounds, her hair is done amazingly) but it's a must download; actually planning on buying it when the price drops a bit. Must play imo.
